item.title: Modeling Biotâ€“Savart law using Machine Learning
item.description: Research The goal of this project is to play with different deep learning architecture to see if we neural net can come up with a function that can model Biot-Savart law. Biot-Savart Law $$ \mathbf{B \left ( r \right)} = \frac{\mu_0}{4\pi} \int_C \frac{I d\mathbf{l} \times \mathbf{r’}{|\mathbf{r’}|^3} $$ Collaborators Case Western Reserve University Mingdong Fan
